judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Egberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManDERINO, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Linda West Oonley, James T. Rcrnney, Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Davis, Appellant.
Submitted April 23, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Egberts, Pomeroy, Nix and ManDERINO, JJ.
John J. King, for appellant.
Linda West Oonley, James T. Rcrnney, Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
July 2, 1973:
